Luzbel/Attilla:

Attilla walked to the ring of fire and in few minutes he was inside, 
He took Panzer's weapon and after that Luzbel took her in arms. With 
out any word both males (with Panzer) took off and flew towards 
BlackFortress


--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> Panzer:;
> 
> She felt the dart sink into her metal skin.  She growled at 
Attilla, 
> reaching for her sidearm.  She pulled it out and aimed at him. 
Before 
> she could pull the trigger, her optics blinked and then faded into 
> sleep mode. She fell to the ground, out cold. Her weapon still in 
her 
> hand.
